verbose_text: Reduction of HOIP by disruption of trimeric LUBAC appears to be mediated via the ubiquitin-proteolytic pathway, because an inhibitor of ubiquitin E1 (MLN-7243), but not lysosomal proteases inhibitors (E64d / pep), could suppress decrease of HOIP in MEFs lacking the SHARPIN subunit of LUBAC (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: ubiquitin E1 (MLN-7243), but not lysosomal proteases inhibitors (E64d/pep), could suppress decrease of HOIP
